explains: adj. 教宗的；罗马教皇的；教皇制度的

sentences.en: But the papal decree goes much further.
sentences.cn: 但教皇的法令给予的还不止这些。

sentences.en: Full Papal Bow Fully prostrate, while kissing the runway.
sentences.cn: 罗马教皇式深鞠躬：完全卧倒，同时亲吻机场的跑道。

sentences.en: Some young punk at Sunday Mass tried to Papal Pound me.
sentences.cn: 一些年轻的朋克在星期天弥撒时试图给我来个教皇式捶打。
